Within your covenant’s domain, you are the law.

  • Your covenant has an army that acts within its domain. Create a connection with someone in this army. You may call upon your connection to annihilate someone within the covenant’s domain. This counts as Testing your Relationship, and on a hit you do not Develop your Relationship.
  • When you Gather Information or Compel by flashing your covenant’s credentials (a tattoo, a ring…), add +1 and gain +1 momentum on a hit.
  • When you intimidate someone into Making a Connection with you, you may roll +iron instead of +heart, if you do so make their rank 1 higher than what you first envisioned. When you Develop your Relationship with this connection, take +1 momentum.
